name: Dune Drifter
description:
Dune Drifter is a top-down action game where you must maneuver around enemies and lead them in to obstacles or other foes. Survive 16 waves of incoming enemies to make it out of the desert! CONTROLS
  • WASD or Arrow Keys  for Movement
  • ESC  or P to Pause
  • R to Restart 
  • M to Mute 
CREDITS
